text:
Hey everyone :wave:

I'm unsure if it exists, if yes please guide me there. But from what I know, we have just a monthly update in bulk on what has been changed inside HubSpot. It'd be so helpful to track specific parts of the HubSpot. For example, as a CMS developer, I'm interested in changes to the CMS a lot and would monitor them closely. But something that is related to workflows or CRM would be a lower priority for me.

Is there a way to track the changes from HubSpot team by hubs or anything else?
Top right dropdown inside HubSpot -> Product Updates -> Filter by apps / products
Good idea for a newsletter, or little side hustle indie hacker project if you ask me!

Probably, I'll add more context

For example, I've recently noticed a link icon next to the field label in the global fonts in theme settings.
+ text transform for same font field.
It was new for me. I'm not sure these tiny changes were covered somewhere in the changelog, neither in the developer blog nor in product updates. As a CMS developer, I'd like to know about these things asap to act accordingly with themes and clients' projects if necessary and not be caught off guard
This text transform thing is a relatively new feature. I don't recall having it in spring, for example
